name: swampertite
effect: Held: Allows Swampert to Mega Evolve into Mega Swampert.
short_effect: Held: Allows Swampert to Mega Evolve into Mega Swampert.

flavor_text.sword_shield: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Swampert hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
